WorkItem.Description: I have a plate item in my bank and it keeps choosing it to equip as optimum...kinda silly.
WorkItem.Summary: Keeps choosing plate for leather wearing druid.

Comments.Message: Unselect it for optimizer. If you can't see it change to a model that can use plate and deselect and move back or directly remove it from character xml. I imagine you got in this situation by using character profiler.
You are correct it was loaded using character profiler.  However, can you elaborate the reason?  Is it a flaw in the profiler or rawr?   Yes, I knew I could deselect it and re-optimize.
